description: Generic listing of all source variables. Should not be used directly, please use SourceVariables or RepeatedSourceVariables instead
Data source that this variable was collected in
Dataset this variable is part of
name of the variable, unique within a table
Human friendly longer name, if applicable
in case of protocolised data collection this defines the moment(s) in time this variable is collected on
When this variable was removed if applicable
Definition of a non-repeated variable, or of the first variable from a repeated range
to define foreign key relationships between variables within or across tables
whether this variable is required within this collection
to sort variables you can optionally add an order value
listing of all repeated variables defined for this variable
Any other information on this variable
in case of protocolised data collection this defines the moment in time this variable is collected on
